thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother new housemate confirmed: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry heading in
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother new housemate confirmed: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry heading in

title: Celebrity Big Brother new housemate confirmed: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry heading in
text:
“Chloe has no filter – she will cause total pandemonium with or without a drink” A source 
The queen of chicken nuggets would certainly liven up the house, which has so far seen a lot of arguments. 
A source told The Sun Online: "If the celebs thought they'd drawn the short straw being locked up with Stacy and Austin, they've not seen nothing yet." 
They added: "Chloe has no filter – she will cause total pandemonium with or without a drink." 
Chloe herself teased some huge news earlier this week with a cryptic tweet on Wednesday. 
TWITTER/CHLOE FERRY SUGGESTIVE: Chloe shared a cryptic tweet 
MTV GETTING AGGY: Chloe Ferry isn't afraid to have a row CBB's sexiest housemates The sexiest ever Celebrity Big Brother housemates. Who's top of your list? 1 / 60 
She wrote: "Am a strong believer in things come when you least expect it." 
MTV fans will know the northern lass from her antics on Geordie Shore, where they have seen literally everything of her. 
Chloe joined the show when she was just 19 and has undergone an insane transformation, complete with nose job , lip and cheek fillers and botox. Related videos
